tooltip.simpleedits.chisel.shift_down: Some are Stone, Sandstone, Tuff, e.t.c
tooltip.simpleedits.wand.shift_down: Commands: /undo to reset, /block to set block type
tooltip.simpleedits.waterdrainwand: Drains water in a selection! Do not use for large bodies!
tooltip.simpleedits.waterdrainwand.shift:
You have to use it on a block beside the water, 
 not on the water itself!
